name: Lancaster Hammond ltd
description:
Lancaster Hammond provides result-oriented healthcare marketing communications consultancy to its industry and membership society clients. Our many years experience you can take for granted, it is our insight which sets us apart from the crowd. If you need to really understand the drivers in your market, if you need to engage your audience, if you need outcomes then you might want to be working with Lancaster Hammond. We work smart, work hard and work together to exceed expectations.
Our clients love the partnership approach we take to our core proposition: Customer Insight, Market Planning, Value Development, Pathways, and Product Positioning.
